body.p: “I see young goose-berries as big as small green peas. Is that low 2 or 3 leaved plant without stem about Saw Mill brook a wood-lettuce? The tall swamp fern by the Eb. Hub’s Close with fertile fronds separate & now cinnamon colored- perhaps a little later than the Interrupted- appears to be the cinnamomea. Is that very side loose-spread fern 3 or 4 feet high now beginning to fruit terminally- the spectabilis- a large specim?”
